import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import './Background.css' import PokemonScreen from '../screens/PokedexScreen' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import './Pokedex.css' const PokedexSinglePokemon = () => { const [previousUrl, setPreviousUrl] = useState("") const [nextUrl, setNextUrl] = useState("") const [url, setUrl] = useState(`https://pokeapi.co/api/v2/pokemon?offset=0&limit=20`) return (
) } export default PokedexSinglePokemon
